alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 7:54PM CST until January 28 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Pickens, Greene and Sumter Counties. Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Greene and Sumter Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Hale, Greene and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning.Thursday morning at 1100 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to late Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 78.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday afternoon to a crest of 101.6 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
